div.div: The Milford School District strives to support the academic achievement for ALL students. The SAU-40 Resource Hub is created to provide learning materials, inspiring ideas, and helpful tips and advice for students, families, and teachers throughout the district. Please check it out!
Kindergarten and New to First Grade Registrations Continue By Appointment.
2020-2021 School District Calendar Approved at the April 13, 2020 School Board Meeting.
